cards.Name: Ariel - On Human Legs
cards.Body_Text: Voiceless - This character can't {e} to sing songs.

cards.Name: Ariel - Spectacular Singer
cards.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

Musical Debut - When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Cinderella - Gentle and Kind
cards.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

A Wonderful Dream - {e} - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

cards.Name: Goofy - Musketeer
cards.Flavor_Text: "En Gawrsh"
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

And Two For Tea! - When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

cards.Name: Hades - King of Olympus
cards.Flavor_Text: "Oh hey, I'm gonna need new business cards."
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.) 

Sinister Plot - This character gets +1 {l} for each other Villain character you have in play.

cards.Name: Hades - Lord of the Underworld
cards.Flavor_Text: "Production is up, costs are down, the rivers are full. Time to talk expansion."
cards.Body_Text: Well of Souls - When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: HeiHei - Boat Snack
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface. Far beneath, in some cases. . . ." 
-Moana
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Lefou - Bumbler
cards.Flavor_Text: You need a good toady to be a proper bad guy.
cards.Body_Text: Loyal - If you have a character named Gaston in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play this character.

cards.Name: Lilo - Making a Wish
cards.Flavor_Text: "A falling star . . . I have to make a wish!"

cards.Name: Maximus - Palace Horse
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Maximus - Relentless Pursuer
cards.Flavor_Text: He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline, and a touch of class.
cards.Body_Text: Horse Kick - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - True Friend
cards.Flavor_Text: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Beloved Princess
cards.Flavor_Text: Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are . . . well, they're around somewhere, probably.

cards.Name: Moana - Of Motunui
cards.Flavor_Text: "I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boar, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti."
cards.Body_Text: We Can Fix It - Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess Characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Mr. Smee - Loyal First Mate
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what good is kindness like that?" 
- Peter Pan

cards.Name: Prince Phillip - Dragonslayer
cards.Flavor_Text:
"The road to true love may be barred by still many more dangers, which you alone will have to face." 
- Flora
cards.Body_Text: Heroism - When this character challenges and is banished, you may banish the challenged character.

cards.Name: Pumbaa - Friendly Warthog
cards.Flavor_Text: "You gotta put your behind in your past."

cards.Name: Rapunzel - Gifted with Healing
cards.Body_Text: Gleam and Glow - When you play this character, remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters. Draw a card for each 1 damage removed this way.

cards.Name: Sebastian - Court Composer
cards.Flavor_Text: "I should be writing symphonies, not tagging along after some headstrong teenager."
cards.Body_Text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

cards.Name: Simba - Protective Cub
cards.Flavor_Text: Courage comes in all sizes.
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Stitch - Carefree Surfer
cards.Flavor_Text:
"So you're from outer space, huh? I hear the surfing's choice." 
- David
cards.Body_Text: Ohana - When you play this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, you may draw 2 cards.

cards.Name: Stitch - New Dog
cards.Flavor_Text:
Lilo: "David! I got a new dog!" 
David: "Auwe! . . . You sure it's a dog?" 
Lilo: "Uh-huh. He used to be a collie before he got ran over."

cards.Name: Stitch - Rock Star
cards.Flavor_Text: The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.) 

Adoring Fans - Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.

cards.Name: Timon - Grub Rustler
cards.Flavor_Text: "There's all manner of tasty treats in the world - ya just gotta know where to look."
cards.Body_Text: Tastes Like Chicken - When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Be Our Guest
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.) 

Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Control Your Temper!
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Hakuna Matata
cards.Flavor_Text: What a wonderful phrase!
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.

cards.Name: Healing Glow
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Don't freak out!"
-Rapunzel
cards.Body_Text: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Just In Time
cards.Flavor_Text: The best heroes always arrive at the perfect moment - whether they know it or not.
cards.Body_Text: You may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

cards.Name: Part of Your World
cards.Flavor_Text:
What would I give
If I could live out of these waters?
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Return a character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: You Have Forgotten Me
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You are more than what you have become."
- Mufasa
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

cards.Name: Dinglehopper
cards.Flavor_Text: Enjoy the finest of human hairstyles!
cards.Body_Text: Straighten Hair: {e} - Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Lantern
cards.Flavor_Text: Lanterns fill the sky on one special night, beacons of hope and love.
cards.Body_Text: Birthday Lights - {e} - You play 1 {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

cards.Name: Ursula's Shell Necklace
cards.Flavor_Text: "Singing is a lovely pastime . . . if you've got the voice for it."  - Ursula
cards.Body_Text: Now, Sing! - Whenever you play a song, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

cards.Name: Anna - Heir to Arendelle
cards.Flavor_Text: "Two sisters, one mind."
cards.Body_Text: Loving Heart - When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Archimedes - Highly Educated Owl
cards.Flavor_Text: "Flying is not merely some crude, mechanical process. It is a delicate art. Purely aesthetic. Poetry of motion. And the best way to learn it is to do it!"

cards.Name: Dr. Facilier - Agent Provocateur
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Dr. Facilier.) 

Into The Shadows - Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

cards.Name: Dr. Facilier - Charlatan
cards.Flavor_Text: "Enchant?e. A tip of the hat from Dr. Facilier."
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (When challenging, this character get +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: Dr. Facilier - Remarkable Gentleman
cards.Body_Text: Dreams Made Real - Whenever you play a song, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

cards.Name: Elsa - Queen Regent
cards.Flavor_Text: "I never knew what I was capable of."

cards.Name: Elsa - Snow Queen
cards.Flavor_Text: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an entirely new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.
cards.Body_Text: Freeze -{e} - Exert chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Elsa - Spirit of Winter
cards.Flavor_Text: Ice is stronger than you may think.
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.) 

Deep Freeze - When you play this character, exert up to 2 chosen characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Flotsam - Ursula's Spy
cards.Flavor_Text: "We know someone who can help you . . . for a price."
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Dexterous Lunge - Your characters named Jetsam gain Rush.

cards.Name: Jafar - Keeper of Secrets
cards.Flavor_Text: There's more than one way to bury secrets.
cards.Body_Text: Hidden Wonders - This character gets +1 {s} for each card in your hand.

cards.Name: Jafar - Wicked Sorcerer
cards.Flavor_Text: "Enough skulking about. It's time to show that sniveling sultan what a sorcerer can do."
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +3 (When challenging, this character gets +3 {s}.)

cards.Name: Jetsam - Ursula's Spy
cards.Flavor_Text: "We can help you get anything you want. . . ."
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) 

Sinister Slither - Your characters named Flotsam gain Evasive.

cards.Name: Magic Broom - Bucket Brigade
cards.Flavor_Text: In the immense story-forge known as the Great Illuminary, there is always work to be done.
cards.Body_Text: Sweep - When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from any discard into its player's deck.

cards.Name: Maleficent - Biding Her Time
cards.Flavor_Text: "One mustn't rush these things, or the greatest plan might come to nothing."

cards.Name: Maleficent - Sorceress
cards.Flavor_Text: "You dare challenge me? Fool, my magic is more powerful than you could possibly imagine!"
cards.Body_Text: Cast My Spell! - When you play this character, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Hey! We were just talking about you! All good things, all good things." 
- Olaf
cards.Body_Text: Durable - When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer
cards.Flavor_Text: He always goes for the clean sweep.
cards.Body_Text:
Animate Broom - You pay 1 {i} less to play Broom characters.

Ceaseless Worker - Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

cards.Name: Olaf - Friendly Snowman
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs!"

cards.Name: Pascal - Rapunzel's Companion
cards.Flavor_Text: A true friend is always there for you, whether you can see them or not.
cards.Body_Text: Camouflage -  While you have another character in play, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Rafiki - Mysterious Sage
cards.Flavor_Text: "The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it."
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Sven - Official Ice Deliverer
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Reindeer comin' through!" 
- Kristoff

cards.Name: The Queen - Wicked and Vain
cards.Flavor_Text: Sublime beauty matched with peerless cunning. Is there any question who is fairest?
cards.Body_Text: I Summon Thee - {e} - Draw a card.

cards.Name: The Wardrobe - Belle's Confidant
cards.Flavor_Text: When you simply must have the hautest couture.

cards.Name: Tinker Bell - Peter Pan's Ally
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)   Loyal and Devoted - Your characters named Peter Pan gain Challenger +1.

cards.Name: Ursula - Power Hungry
cards.Flavor_Text: The first rule of Villainy: If you're going to be evil, you've got to have style.
cards.Body_Text: It's Too Easy! - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore. You may draw a card for each 1 lore lost this way.

cards.Name: Yzma - Alchemist
cards.Flavor_Text: "When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"
cards.Body_Text: You're Excused - Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck

cards.Name: Zeus - God of Lightning
cards.Flavor_Text: "A little lightning solves a whole lot of problems."
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character get +4 {s}.)

cards.Name: Befuddle
cards.Flavor_Text: Never be afraid to have your mind boggled now and then.
cards.Body_Text: Return a character or item with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Freeze
cards.Flavor_Text: It's time for you to chill.
cards.Body_Text: Exert chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Friends On The Other Side
cards.Flavor_Text:
The cards, the cards
the cards will tell . . .
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Draw 2 Cards

cards.Name: Reflection
cards.Flavor_Text:
When will my reflection show
Who I am inside?
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put them back on the top of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Magic Mirror
cards.Flavor_Text: "What wouldst thou know, my Queen?"
cards.Body_Text: Speak! - {e}, 4 {i} - Draw a card.

cards.Name: Ursula's Cauldron
cards.Flavor_Text: Perfect for mixing potions and stealing voices.
cards.Body_Text: Peer Into The Depths - {e} - Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

cards.Name: White Rabbit's Pocket Watch
cards.Flavor_Text: "No wonder you're late. Why, this watch is exactly two days slow." - The Mad Hatter
cards.Body_Text: I'm Late! - {e}, 1{i} - Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Aladdin - Prince Ali
cards.Flavor_Text: Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable. Genuinely inauthentic.
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Beast - Wolfsbane
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'll take on all of you if I have to!"
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Roar - When you play this character, exert all opposing damaged characters.

cards.Name: Cheshire Cat - Not All There
cards.Flavor_Text: "You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself."
cards.Body_Text: Lose Something? - When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

cards.Name: Cruella De Vil - Miserable as Usual
cards.Flavor_Text: When she stops by, misery is company.
cards.Body_Text: You'll Be Sorry! - When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Duke Of Weselton - Opportunistic Official
cards.Flavor_Text: "Sorcery! I knew there was something dubious going on here."

cards.Name: Flynn Rider - Charming Rogue
cards.Flavor_Text: "I didn't want to have to do this, but you leave me no choice. . . ."
cards.Body_Text: Here Comes The Smolder - Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: Genie - On the Job
cards.Flavor_Text: "Can your friends go 'Abracadabra, let 'er rip' and then make the sucker disappear?"
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) 

Disappear - When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Genie - Powers Unleashed
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.) 

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) 

Phenomenal Cosmic Power! - Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

cards.Name: Genie - The Ever Impressive
cards.Flavor_Text: "You can wish for nearly anything! Do you want the short version, or should I give you the whole song and dance?"

cards.Name: Hans - Scheming Prince
cards.Flavor_Text: "Rules are like older siblings. All they do is get in the way."

cards.Name: Horace - No-Good Scoundrel
cards.Flavor_Text: "Well, they ain't in here, Jasper."

cards.Name: Iago - Loud-Mouthed Parrot
cards.Body_Text: You Got A Problem? - {e} - Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Jasper - Common Crook
cards.Flavor_Text: "Now, look here, Horace, I warned you about thinkin'."
cards.Body_Text: Puppynapping - Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

cards.Name: John Silver - Alien Pirate
cards.Flavor_Text: "Don't be too put off by this . . . hunk of hardware."
cards.Body_Text: Pick Your Fights - When you play this character and whenever he quests, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Jumba Jookiba - Renegade Scientist
cards.Flavor_Text: "Created something? Ha! But that would be irresponsible and unethical. I would never, ever . . . make more than one."

cards.Name: Kuzco - Temperamental Emperor
cards.Flavor_Text: "I asked for emerald and that is clearly jade! What is wrong with you people?"
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) 

No Touchy! - When this character is challenged and banished, you may banish the challenging character.

cards.Name: Lady Tremaine - Wicked Stepmother
cards.Flavor_Text: "If your chores are done, then clearly you don't have enough of them."
cards.Body_Text: Do It Again! - When you play this character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Mad Hatter - Gracious Host
cards.Flavor_Text:
Mad Hatter: "Would you like a little more tea?" 
Alice: "I haven't had any yet, so I can't very well take more."
cards.Body_Text: Tea Party - Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Megara - Pulling the Strings
cards.Flavor_Text: "A deal's a deal. But falling in love was never supposed to be a part of it."
cards.Body_Text: Wonder Boy - When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue
cards.Flavor_Text: Quiet as a... well, you know.
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) 

Misdirection - Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Steamboat Pilot
cards.Flavor_Text: On rivers throughout the Inklands, the little steamboat's whistle answers the cheery tunes of its pilot.

cards.Name: Mother Gothel - Selfish Manipulator
cards.Flavor_Text: "Great. Now I'm the bad guy."
cards.Body_Text: Skip The Drama, Stay With Mama - While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't quest.

cards.Name: Peter Pan - Never Landing
cards.Flavor_Text: "What's the matter, Hook? Can't you fly?"
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Tamatoa - Drab Little Crab
cards.Flavor_Text: "Someday, I'll grow up to be the most crabulous crustacean the world has ever seen!"

cards.Name: Tinker Bell - Most Helpful
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) 

Pixie Dust - When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive this turn.

cards.Name: Do It Again!
cards.Flavor_Text:
". . . Then scrub the terrace, sweep the halls and the stairs, clean the chimneys. And of course there's the mending, and the sewing, and the laundry . . ."
 - Lady Tremaine
cards.Body_Text: Return an action card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Mother Knows Best
cards.Flavor_Text:
One way or another
Something will go wrong, I swear
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Return chosen character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Stampede
cards.Flavor_Text: A wildebeest stampede is like a raging river: best experienced from a distance.
cards.Body_Text: Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

cards.Name: Steal From The Rich
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Wonder how much ol' Prince John spent on all those fancy locks." 
-Little John
cards.Body_Text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Sudden Chill
cards.Flavor_Text: Cruella De Vil, Cruella De Vil, If she doesn't scare you, no evil thing will
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: The Beast Is Mine!
cards.Flavor_Text:
"It's only fitting that the finest hunter get the foulest beast!" 
-Gaston
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Vicious Betrayal
cards.Flavor_Text:
"A true king takes matters into his own claws."
 -Scar
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. If a villain character is chosen, they get +3 {s} instead.

cards.Name: Dr. Facilier's Cards
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Take a little trip into your future with me!" 
-Dr. Facilier
cards.Body_Text: The Cards Will Tell - {e} - You pay 1 {i} less for the next action you play this turn.

cards.Name: Stolen Scimitar
cards.Flavor_Text: Sometimes you've got to take what you can get.
cards.Body_Text: Slash - {e} - Chosen character gets +1 {s} this turn. If a character named Aladdin is chosen, he get +2 {s} instead.

cards.Name: Abu - Mischievous Monkey
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Someday, Abu, things are gonna change. We'll be rich, live in a palace, and never have any problems at all."
-Aladdin

cards.Name: Aladdin - Heroic Outlaw
cards.Body_Text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)   Daring Exploit - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore.

cards.Name: Aladdin - Street Rat
cards.Flavor_Text: It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough.
cards.Body_Text: Improvise - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Captain - Colonel's Lieutenant
cards.Flavor_Text: "Barking signal. It's an alert. Report to the Colonel at once!"

cards.Name: Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate
cards.Flavor_Text: "You wouldn't dare fight old hook man-to-man!"
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

You Coward! - While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Evasive gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Boisterous Fowl
cards.Flavor_Text: "Who you callin' boisterous, buster?"

cards.Name: Elsa - Ice Surfer
cards.Flavor_Text: "My sister has always been there for me. I need to be there for her."
cards.Body_Text: That's No Blizzard! - Whenever you play a character named Anna, ready this character. This character can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Gaston - Arrogant Hunter
cards.Flavor_Text: It's not arrogance when you really are the best.
cards.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.Name: Goofy - Daredevil
cards.Flavor_Text: Sometimes you gotta give it the ol' jump and hyuck.
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Lefou - Instigator
cards.Flavor_Text: All a mob needs is a push in the wrong direction.
cards.Body_Text: Fan The Flames - When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon
cards.Flavor_Text: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.
cards.Body_Text: Dragon Fire - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

cards.Name: Maui - Hero to All
cards.Flavor_Text: "What I believe you were trying to say is 'Thank you.'"
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor
cards.Flavor_Text: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Always Classy
cards.Flavor_Text: Her fashion sense is always spot on.

cards.Name: Moana - Chosen by the Ocean
cards.Flavor_Text: "You know who you are."
cards.Body_Text: This Is Not Who You Are - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Te Ka.

cards.Name: Mulan - Imperial Soldier
cards.Body_Text: Lead By Example - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Peter Pan - Fearless Fighter
cards.Flavor_Text: "Nobody calls Pan a coward and lives! I'll fight you man-to-man, with one hand behind my back."
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Pongo - Ol' Rascal
cards.Flavor_Text: "At first I had no particular plan, just anything to attract attention. You know, stir things up a bit."
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Rapunzel - Letting Down Her Hair
cards.Flavor_Text: "Who are you? And how did you find me?"
cards.Body_Text: Tangle - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Scar - Fiery Usurper
cards.Flavor_Text: Consumed by the flames of ambition.

cards.Name: Scar - Shameless Firebrand
cards.Flavor_Text: "The time has come to take what is ours!"
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Scar.) 

Rousing Speech - When you play this character, ready your characters with cost 3 or less. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Sergeant Tibbs - Courageous Cat
cards.Flavor_Text: "Yes, sir. Righto, sir. Right away, sir!"

cards.Name: Stitch - Abomination
cards.Flavor_Text:
"His destructive programming is taking effect. He will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe." 
-Jumba Jookiba

cards.Name: Te Ka - The Burning One
cards.Flavor_Text: She burns for that which was stolen from her.
cards.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.Name: Tigger - Wonderful Thing
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!"
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Be Prepared
cards.Flavor_Text: "Our teeth and ambitions are bared!"
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Banish all Characters.

cards.Name: Cut To The Chase
cards.Flavor_Text: "Surprise!"
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Dragon Fire
cards.Flavor_Text: Rare is the hero who can withstand a dragon's wrath.
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen character

cards.Name: Fan The Flames
cards.Flavor_Text: Pretty words can move a crowd, but so can ugly ones.
cards.Body_Text: Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: He's Got A Sword!
cards.Flavor_Text:
"We've all got swords!" 
-Razoul
cards.Body_Text: Chosen Character gets +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Tangle
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Stay right there! I mean, you don't have a choice, I guess. But still! Don't move!" 
-Rapunzel
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Poisoned Apple
cards.Flavor_Text:
"One taste of the poisoned apple, and the victim's eyes will close forever...." 
-The Queen
cards.Body_Text: Take A Bite . . . - 1 {i}, Banish this item - Exert chosen character. If a princess character is chosen, banish her instead.

cards.Name: Shield Of Virtue
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Arm thyself with this enchanted Shield of Virtue and this mighty Sword of Truth, for these weapons of righteousness will triumph over evil." 
-Flora
cards.Body_Text: Fireproof - {e}, 3 {i} - Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Sword Of Truth
cards.Flavor_Text: Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss.
cards.Body_Text: Final Enchantment - Banish this item - Banish chosen villain character.

cards.Name: Ariel - Whoseit Collector
cards.Flavor_Text: "You want thingamabobs? I got twenty."
cards.Body_Text: Look At This Stuff - Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.

cards.Name: Aurora - Briar Rose
cards.Flavor_Text:
"There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real . . ."
-Prince Phillip
cards.Body_Text: Disarming Beauty - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Aurora - Dreaming Guardian
cards.Flavor_Text: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.
cards.Body_Text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)   Protective Embrace - Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Aurora - Regal Princess
cards.Flavor_Text: "They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!"

cards.Name: Belle - Inventive Engineer
cards.Flavor_Text: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.
cards.Body_Text: Tinker - Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

cards.Name: Belle - Strange but special
cards.Flavor_Text: "Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince in disguise . . ."
cards.Body_Text:
Read A Book - During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

My Favorite Part! - While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {l}.

cards.Name: Chief Tui - Respected Leader
cards.Flavor_Text: "You can always rely on the strength of those who love you."
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen characters {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Strutting His Stuff
cards.Flavor_Text: Walk smarter, not harder.
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Flounder - Voice Of Reason
cards.Flavor_Text: "Excitement . . . adventure . . . danger lurking around every cor- AAAAAGGH!"

cards.Name: Gramma Tala - Storyteller
cards.Flavor_Text:
Moana: "Is there something you want to tell me?" 
Gramma Tala: "Is there something you want to hear?"
cards.Body_Text: I Will Be With You - When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Hades - Infernal Schemer
cards.Flavor_Text: "He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's got a weakness."
cards.Body_Text: Is There A Downside To This? - When you play this character, you may put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown.

cards.Name: Jasmine - Disguised
cards.Flavor_Text: "Try to understand. I've never done a thing on my own. I've never had any real friends. . . . I've never even been outside the palace walls."

cards.Name: Jasmine - Queen Of Agrabah
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.) 

Caretaker - When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

cards.Name: Maleficent - Sinister Visitor
cards.Flavor_Text: "The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel. . . ."

cards.Name: Maleficent - Uninvited
cards.Flavor_Text: She had no invitation-and needed no introduction.

cards.Name: Maurice - World-Famous Inventor
cards.Body_Text:
Give It A Try - Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

It Works! - Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor
cards.Flavor_Text: "What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll have to modernize it."
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Detective
cards.Flavor_Text: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.
cards.Body_Text: Get A Clue - When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Mufasa - King of the Pride Lands
cards.Flavor_Text: "A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size."

cards.Name: Philoctetes - Trainer of Heroes
cards.Flavor_Text: "Ya gotta be the best to train the best. And I train the best!"
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Robin Hood - Unrivaled Archer
cards.Flavor_Text: "We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."
cards.Body_Text: Feed The Poor - When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.  Good Shot - During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Scar - Mastermind
cards.Flavor_Text: "The best plans involve a little danger. Just not for me."
cards.Body_Text: Insidious Plot - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Tamatoa - So Shiny!
cards.Flavor_Text: "Watch me dazzle like a diamond in the rough!"
cards.Body_Text:
What Have We Here? - When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return an item card from your discard to your hand.

Glam - This character gets +1 {l} for each item you have in play.

cards.Name: Triton - The Sea King
cards.Flavor_Text: "Isn't 'Because I said so' enough of a reason?"

cards.Name: Develop Your Brain
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Knowledge, wisdom-there's the real power!" 
-Merlin
cards.Body_Text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.

cards.Name: If It's Not Baroque
cards.Flavor_Text: ". . . Don't fix it."
cards.Body_Text: Return an item card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Let It Go
cards.Flavor_Text:
It's time to see what I can do 
To test the limits and break through
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: One Jump Ahead
cards.Flavor_Text:
Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat- 
Tell you all about it when I got the time
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Work Together
cards.Flavor_Text:
Pacho: "Put your whole back into it!" 
Kuzco: "This is my whole back!"
cards.Body_Text: Chosen Character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Coconut Basket
cards.Flavor_Text: The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything-including baskets to carry more coconuts.
cards.Body_Text: Consider The Coconut - Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Eye Of The Fates
cards.Flavor_Text: You can change the future once you know what you're looking at.
cards.Body_Text: See The Future - {e} - Chosen character gets +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Fishbone Quill
cards.Flavor_Text:
"If you want to cross the bridge, my sweet, you've got to pay the toll." 
-Ursula
cards.Body_Text: Go Ahead And Sing - {e} - Put any card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

cards.Name: Magic Golden Flower
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Once upon a time, a single drop of sunlight fell from the heavens. . . ." 
-Flynn Rider
cards.Body_Text: Healing Pollen - Banish this item - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Scepter Of Arendelle
cards.Body_Text: Command - {e}- Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Aladdin - Cornered Swordsman
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a backbone!" 
-Razoul

cards.Name: Beast - Hardheaded
cards.Flavor_Text: "She'll never see me as anything . . . but a monster."
cards.Body_Text: Break - When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

cards.Name: Captain Hook - Captain of the Jolly Roger
cards.Flavor_Text: "A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We'll pot 'em like sitting ducks."
cards.Body_Text: Double The Powder - When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Captain Hook - Forceful Duelist
cards.Flavor_Text: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (When challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: Captain Hook - Thinking a Happy Thought
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) 

Challenger +3 When challenging, this character get +3 {s}.) 

Stolen Dust - Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

cards.Name: Cerberus - Three-Headed Dog
cards.Flavor_Text: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting for the ball.

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Musketeer
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) 

Stay Alert! - During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Gantu - Galactic Federation Captain
cards.Flavor_Text: "Relax, enjoy the trip... and don't get any ideas!"
cards.Body_Text: Under Arrest - Characters with cost 2 or less can't challenge your characters.

cards.Name: Goons - Maleficent's Underlings
cards.Flavor_Text: They may be useless, but they came with the castle.

cards.Name: Hans - Thirteenth in Line
cards.Flavor_Text: Tired of being last, he decided to cut the line.
cards.Body_Text: Stage A Little Accident - Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Hercules - True Hero
cards.Flavor_Text: "You gotta admit, that was pretty heroic."
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Kristoff - Offical Ice Master
cards.Flavor_Text:
Kristoff: "You want to talk about a supply and demand problem? I sell ice for a living" 
Anna: "Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I mean, that is really-ah, mm. That's unfortunate."

cards.Name: Kronk - Right-Hand Man
cards.Flavor_Text: "Oh yeah. It's all coming together!"

cards.Name: Lilo - Galactic Hero
cards.Flavor_Text: "Space. That's where the aliens come from. And also tourists!"

cards.Name: Maui - Demigod
cards.Flavor_Text: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's owner is optional.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

All For One - Your other musketeer character get +1 {s}.

cards.Name: Prince Eric - Dashing and Brave
cards.Flavor_Text: "I lost her once! I'm not gonna lose her again!"
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (When challenging, this character get +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: Simba - Future King
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'm gonna be the best king the Pride Lands have ever seen!"
cards.Body_Text: Guess What? - When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Simba - Returned King
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'll do whatever it takes to save my kingdom."
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {s}.)

POUNCE: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Simba - Rightful Heir
cards.Flavor_Text: "I can't hide anymore. It's time to accept my destiny."
cards.Body_Text: I Know What I Have To Do - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Starkey - Hook's Henchman
cards.Flavor_Text: A pirate must be tough, loyal, and strong. "Smart" doesn't even make the list.
cards.Body_Text: Aye Aye, Captain - While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +1 {l}.

cards.Name: Te Ka - Heartless
cards.Flavor_Text:
Maui: "Ever defeat a lava monster?" 
Moana: "No, have you?"
cards.Body_Text: Seek The Heart - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Tinker Bell - Giant Fairy
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.) 

ROCK THE BOAT: When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

Puny Pirate! - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Tinker Bell - Tiny Tactician
cards.Flavor_Text: Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.
cards.Body_Text: Battle Plans - {e} - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: A Whole New World
cards.Flavor_Text: Shining, shimmering, splendid . . .
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards.

cards.Name: Break
cards.Flavor_Text: No one throws a tantrum like a beast.
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen item.

cards.Name: Fire The Cannons!
cards.Flavor_Text:
Captain Hook: "Double the powder and shorten the fuse!" 
Mr. Smee: "Shorten the powder and double the fuse!"
cards.Body_Text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Grab Your Sword
cards.Flavor_Text:
We don't like
What we don't understand
In fact, it scares us
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Deal 2 damage to each opposing character.

cards.Name: Ransack
cards.Flavor_Text: Who has time to read labels?
cards.Body_Text: Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards.

cards.Name: Smash
cards.Flavor_Text: "Go away!"
cards.Body_Text: Deal 3 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Beast's Mirror
cards.Flavor_Text: Ashamed of his monstrous form, the Beast concealed himself inside his castle, with a magic mirror as his only window to the outside world.
cards.Body_Text: Show Me - {e}, 3 {i} - If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

cards.Name: Frying Pan
cards.Flavor_Text: It's a fine piece of cookware, but as a weapon it's truly stunning.
cards.Body_Text: Clang! - Banish this item - Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.

cards.Name: Musketeer Tabard
cards.Flavor_Text: There's no such thing as a lone musketeer.
cards.Body_Text: All For One And One For All - Whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Plasma Blaster
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You don't have to say 'pew pew' when you use it, but it doesn't hurt." 
-Lilo, galactic hero
cards.Body_Text: Quick Shot - {e}, 2 {i}: Deal 1 damage to chosen character.
